public class zeta.format.impl.FormatPrinter

(source file: impl/FormatPrinter.java)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.format.impl.FormatPrinter
The pure class interface. 
public class FormatPrinter
  extends Object
The FormatPrinter class defines functions for computing and printing Formats for all kinds of Java objects. This can be used to dump Java objects in a readable manner.

Author:
Jacob Wieland (ughosage@cs.tu-berlin.de)
See also:
Format

FormatPrinter()

breakString(String, String)
This function breaks the given text at the given delimiters.

breakString

public static String[] breakString(String text,
                                   String delimiters);
This function breaks the given text at the given delimiters.

Parameters:
text - the string to be broken
delimiters - a string containing delimiter characters
Returns:
an array of strings and delimiters
